messages:
Name: Mario Lemina
Nationality: Gabon
Date of Birth: September 1, 1993
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Wolverhampton Wanderers
Premier League clubs played for: Southampton, Fulham, Wolverhampton Wanderers

Midfielder Mario Lemina plays for Wolverhampton Wanderers and has appeared in the majority of the side's Premier League games in 2024/2025, making 17 appearances overall and playing 1,365 minutes. He has started in 15 of these appearances across their 24 fixtures and been used as a substitute on two occasions.

Lemina last made an appearance in a Premier League game on January 6, playing 31 minutes for Wolverhampton Wanderers versus Nottingham Forest in a 3-0 loss. In total, the midfielder has netted one Premier League goal in 2024/2025, and registered three assists. He has been shown four yellow cards.
His opening goal of the campaign came in the 2-1 loss against Newcastle United on September 15.
Wolverhampton Wanderers next face a trip to Liverpool in Premier League action on February 16.
Last season for Wolverhampton Wanderers, Lemina made 35 Premier League appearances, scored four goals and provided one assist.
Lemina moved to Wolverhampton Wanderers in January 2023 from Nice, for whom he made 46 league appearances in total, scoring two goals.

Lemina made his first Premier League appearance for Southampton on August 19, 2017, playing 65 minutes as a starter against West Ham United at the age of 23 years and 352 days. He first played in a Premier League game for current club Wolverhampton Wanderers in his team's match against West Ham United on January 14, 2023.
Overall, in his Premier League career, he has played 145 matches in the competition, with eight goals and seven assists. Lemina has also been sent off twice, with 28 yellow cards collected overall.
